Welcome to SciAssist’s documentation!

SciAssist is a toolkit to assist scientists’ research. SciAssist currently supports reference string parsing, more functions are under active development by WING@NUS, Singapore. The project was built upon an open-sourced template by ashleve.

Check out the Usage section for further information, including how to use the tool.

Note

This project is under active development.
